text: Len Hustler (30 September 1920 – 14 September 1981) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1920 births Category:1981 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Len Hustler
